### Load data

```{r}
B_growth_sum <- read_xlsx("data/sizes/B_2023POGS_small_seed_daily/B_sizes_12172024.xlsx")
B_growth_sum$date <- as.Date(B_growth_sum$date)
B_growth_sum <- B_growth_sum[which(B_growth_sum$date < as.Date("2024-12-17")),]


D_growth_sum <- read_xlsx("data/sizes/D_2023POGS_small_seed_weekly/D_sizes_12172024.xlsx", guess_max = 2000)
D_growth_sum$date <- as.Date(D_growth_sum$date)
D_growth_sum <- D_growth_sum[which(D_growth_sum$date < as.Date("2024-12-17")),]

Dec_sizes <- read_xlsx("data/outplanting/Westcott/20241217_images/sizes_12172024.xlsx")
May_sizes <- read_xlsx("data/outplanting/Westcott/20250513_images/sizes_05132025.xlsx")


```
